metadata.title: CVE-2022-1012 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: tcp: Information leakage through limited randomness in source port selection It was discovered that the IP implementation in the Linux kernel did not provide sufficient randomization when calculating port offsets. An attacker could possibly use this to expose sensitive information.
